title: Heartseeker ward question!!!
body:
Hello everyone just got a quick question if anyone could answer me i would GREATLY appreciate it! So i was wondering how long will the heartseeker ward be up for? I get payed the 20th so im just wondering if i'll make it in time to buy it xD
Thank you :D

replies.body: The Heartseeker Ward is not legacy, so it's not going anywhere. :]
Awesome thank you for letting me know :DD!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=8LErcZEV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-14T02:31:33.217+0000)
>
> The Heartseeker Ward is not legacy, so it's not going anywhere. :]

Well the only reason I bought this ward was because it was listed under legacy.

Wow. That username of yours. I thought something didn't match up when I typed in Rektless on the game client. lol. Season 4 Diamond and currently Gold 5. I was like, wow, that drop. Then I'm like "wait....the name still doesn't look right". Then I see that yours is Rektiess. With a capitalized i. lol. Fun fact, you and the actual Rektless person are both Gold 5. =P
Must be some sort of fate :o
Maybe you should friend him and do the climb to Diamond together =o
